problem.markdown: 5.Which of the following is TRUE at the switching threshold of a static CMOS inverter? ( ) Input voltage is equal to output voltage ( ) nMOS and pMOS are in saturation mode ( ) Vds=Vgs for both devices (x) All the above
problem.p: 5.Which of the following is TRUE at the switching threshold of a static CMOS inverter?

choicegroup.choice: Input voltage is equal to output voltage
nMOS and pMOS are in saturation mode
